title: Date set for Hadouken 2.0 release
content:
Short update - a release date has been set for Hadouken 2.0. It's gonna happen on the 27th of february, and we're gonna meet up a few friends and have som beers and upload the 2.0 version. Up until the release I will focus on correcting bugs and fixing the last of the features, and after the release I'll try to release early and often.

The new website will be published before the 27th. It has a sweet API for both plugins and Hadouken releases.
